title: Compare speed and KE after collision

content.question: A railroad car of mass m is moving with speed u when it collides with and connects to a second railroad car of mass 3m, initially at rest, as shown above. How do the speed and kinetic energy of the connected cars compare to those of the single car of mass m before the collision?

choices.label: Speed Kinetic Energy Less The same
Speed Kinetic Energy The same Less
Speed Kinetic Energy The same The same
Speed Kinetic Energy Greater The same

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
